Coronavirus update

  • Most branches will start reopening from Mon 6 July. Please note the new opening hours.
  • Browsing will not be possible to begin with.
  • No printing, computing or room hire.
  • Online reservations will not begin yet.
  • Weâ€™ll be running a phone/email ordering and collection service.

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: free parking next to the library
  • Out-of-hours book return available
  • Refreshments: tea and coffee making facilities
  • Which? available - ask staff for magazine or to log in
  • For sale: handmade cards, postage stamps

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Borrow an iPad for use in the library only
  • Photocopying: A3 and A4 colour photocopying
  • Colour printing: A4 colour printing
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges
